customrecordtype.description: The record to store the responses from USAePay

customrecordcustomfield.description: The mapped Transaction Key number of the saved USAePay transaction.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The mapped Transaction Key number of the saved USAePay transaction.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Transaction Key

customrecordcustomfield.description: Non-cash adjustment percentage from Customer record. Customer is charged with additional amount if they opt to pay via credit card.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Non-cash adjustment percentage from Customer record. Customer is charged with additional amount if they opt to pay via credit card.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Non-Cash Adj %

customrecordcustomfield.description: Masked Credit Car number that was swiped at the terminal, populated upon successful payment in ePay
customrecordcustomfield.help: Masked Credit Car number that was swiped at the terminal, populated upon successful payment in ePay
customrecordcustomfield.label: CC Masked Card No

customrecordcustomfield.description: The credit card token record to be used for payment
customrecordcustomfield.help: The credit card token record to be used for payment
customrecordcustomfield.label: CC Token

customrecordcustomfield.description: When paying via card, the Card Type of card used.
customrecordcustomfield.label: CC Type

customrecordcustomfield.description: When paying via card, this is the Credit Card Holder Name
customrecordcustomfield.help: When paying via card, this is the Credit Card Holder Name
customrecordcustomfield.label: CC Token Holder Name

customrecordcustomfield.description: Identify if a transaction is for Authorization Only. Card will not be charged yet. Payment will only be processed once related Fulfillment is created for this Sales Order.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Identify if a transaction is for Authorization Only. Card will not be charged yet. Payment will only be processed once related Fulfillment is created for this Sales Order.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Is Auth Only?

customrecordcustomfield.description: When a transaction is created in USAePay, they belong to a batch. Stores the USAePay batch key
customrecordcustomfield.help: When a transaction is created in USAePay, they belong to a batch. Stores the USAePay batch key
customrecordcustomfield.label: CC Batch Key

customrecordcustomfield.description: When a transaction is created in USAePay, they belong to a batch. Stores the USAePay batch reference number
customrecordcustomfield.help: When a transaction is created in USAePay, they belong to a batch. Stores the USAePay batch reference number
customrecordcustomfield.label: CC Batch Ref Num

customrecordcustomfield.description: Stores the batch status of a transaction from USAePay
customrecordcustomfield.help: Stores the batch status of a transaction from USAePay
customrecordcustomfield.label: CC Batch Status

customrecordcustomfield.description: Non-cash adjustment amount to charge to customer when using card payment.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Non-cash adjustment amount to charge to customer when using card payment.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Non-Cash Adj Amount

customrecordcustomfield.description: Field used to select the type of ScalePay Payment Type in transactions.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Field used to select the type of ScalePay Payment Type in transactions.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment Submethod

customrecordcustomfield.description: This stores which device was used to swipe the card and make a payment.
customrecordcustomfield.help: This stores which device was used to swipe the card and make a payment.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Device Used

customrecordcustomfield.description: When refunding to other card, populate this field, or, if refund via token, this is automatically sourced from the selected token of the customer
customrecordcustomfield.help: When refunding to other card, populate this field, or, if refund via token, this is automatically sourced from the selected token of the customer
customrecordcustomfield.label: CC Refund Account

customrecordcustomfield.description: Name on card, can be manually populated, or sourced from the selected list of token, when doing refund to token
customrecordcustomfield.label: CC Refund Account Name

customrecordcustomfield.description: If customer would like to refund using a card token from the system. This sources from the available card token of the selected customer in the customer refund record
customrecordcustomfield.help: If customer would like to refund using a card token from the system. This sources from the available card token of the selected customer in the customer refund record
customrecordcustomfield.label: CC Refund Token

customrecordcustomfield.description: Expiry date of the card, when doing a refund to other card, or refund via token. Can be manually populated, or sourced based on selected token
customrecordcustomfield.help: Expiry date of the card, when doing a refund to other card, or refund via token. Can be manually populated, or sourced based on selected token
customrecordcustomfield.label: CC Refund Token Expiry (MMYY)

customrecordcustomfield.description: The mapped ACH Transaction Key number of the saved USAePay transaction.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The mapped ACH Transaction Key number of the saved USAePay transaction.
customrecordcustomfield.label: ACH Key

customrecordcustomfield.description: Field used to select the bank in Customer Refund.
customrecordcustomfield.label: ACH Bank Account

customrecordcustomfield.description: Field used to store the ACH Bank Name in transactions.
customrecordcustomfield.label: ACH Bank Name

customrecordcustomfield.description: Field used to store the ACH Account Number in transactions.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Field used to store the ACH Account Number in transactions.
customrecordcustomfield.label: ACH Account Num

customrecordcustomfield.description: The status description of the ACH transaction.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The status description of the ACH transaction.
customrecordcustomfield.label: ACH Status Details

customrecordcustomfield.description: If a customer refund is to be voided, this checkbox is marked by the script, so that another user event script can process the request as void/rather than refund
customrecordcustomfield.help: If a customer refund is to be voided, this checkbox is marked by the script, so that another user event script can process the request as void/rather than refund
customrecordcustomfield.label: To be Voided?

customrecordcustomfield.description:
This field is used to mark if a Customer Deposit or Payment has been reversed mainly via the saved search 'ScalePay: Rejected Deposits and Payments'.
This can be because the ACH payment was ultimately cancelled and there is need to correct the records.
customrecordcustomfield.help:
This field is used to mark if a Customer Deposit or Payment has been reversed mainly via the saved search 'ScalePay: Rejected Deposits and Payments'.
This can be because the ACH payment was ultimately cancelled and there is need to correct the records.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Is Payment Reversed?
